amendment.description: An amendment numbered 6 printed in Part C of House Report 115-212 to ensure that the water rights of federally recognized Indian tribes are not affected by this bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pearce amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Pearce amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Pearce.
